ptdb.kernel.bl.search

Interface ResultHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSearcher, AttributeSearcher, CommandSearcher, GraphSearcher, HierarchyFetcher, NameSearcher, PatternMatchGraphSearcher, SearchResultBuffer, XQueryGraphSearcher

    public interface ResultHandler
    Handles the results from the searched models, according to different implementation of the actual handling function.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Alek Wang
    Accepted Rating:
    red (wenjiaow)
    Proposed Rating:
    red (wenjiaow)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleIntermediateResults(java.util.List<XMLDBModel> intermediateResults, ResultHandler resultHandler)
      Handle the intermediate results that got from a certain ResultHandler instance.
      void handleResults(java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> modelResults)
      To be implemented by the concrete classes to implement the function to handle the results of searched models.
      boolean isSearchCancelled()
      Check whether the searching process has been canceled by the user.
      void passErrorModels(java.util.List<XMLDBModel> errorModels)
      In the case of getting some models that cannot be parsed or contains some error, use this method to pass these error models to store for error handling.
      void setConnection(DBConnection connection)
      Set the DB connection for this result handler.
      void wholeSearchDone()
      Notify the search result buffer that the searching is done.

    • Method Detail

      • handleIntermediateResults

        void handleIntermediateResults(java.util.List<XMLDBModel> intermediateResults,
                               ResultHandler resultHandler)
        Handle the intermediate results that got from a certain ResultHandler instance.
        Parameters:
        intermediateResults - The intermediate results set to be handled in this ResultHandler.
        resultHandler - The ResultHandler instance that gets the passed intermediate results.

      • handleResults

        void handleResults(java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> modelResults)
            throws DBConnectionException,
                   DBExecutionException
        To be implemented by the concrete classes to implement the function to handle the results of searched models.
        Parameters:
        modelResults - The searched model results to be handled.
        Throws:
        DBConnectionException - Database connection problem occurs during handling the results through searching in the database.
        DBExecutionException - Thrown from the database layer when there is error occurring in the execution.

      • isSearchCancelled

        boolean isSearchCancelled()
        Check whether the searching process has been canceled by the user.
        Returns:
        true - The search has been canceled by the user.
        false - The search hasn't been canceled.

      • passErrorModels

        void passErrorModels(java.util.List<XMLDBModel> errorModels)
        In the case of getting some models that cannot be parsed or contains some error, use this method to pass these error models to store for error handling.
        Parameters:
        errorModels - The error models.

      • setConnection

        void setConnection(DBConnection connection)
        Set the DB connection for this result handler.
        Parameters:
        connection - The DBConnection instance to be set in this result handler.

      • wholeSearchDone

        void wholeSearchDone()
              throws DBConnectionException
        Notify the search result buffer that the searching is done.
        Throws:
        DBConnectionException - Thrown if the DB connection cannot be obtained.
